about.title: Know Us
about.desc: Sarat is built by a team of industry experts who have decades of experience from government and multinational companies. Sarat offers local products and international investors a smooth path to Saudi Arabia. Sarat was established with the sole purpose of providing an exclusive platform to service companies. Service providers are looking for a professional partner in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

content.desc1: Saratt is built by a team of industry experts with decades of experience from government and multinational corporations. Saratt offers local products and a friendly path for international investors.
content.desc2: Saratt is built by a team of industry experts with years of experience from government and international companies. Saratt offers local products and provides a friendly path for international investors.
content.desc3: Saratt is built by a team of industry experts with contracts from various nationalities. Saratt offers local products and is a friendly choice for international investors due to its approach.
content.desc4: Saratt is built by individuals passionate about innovation. Saratt offers local products and provides a friendly path for international investors.

items.three: Years of Experience in the Field

services.title: Our Services
services.desc: We offer a comprehensive range of services to help organizations operate more efficiently. Everything from establishing excellence standards to training your employees to work more effectively, and evaluating your performance.

items.title1: Establishment of Companies and Government Services
items.desc1: Ensuring full compliance with the intricate network of laws and regulations, specializing with a focus on the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. We have cultivated close relationships with key regulatory authorities, including the Ministry of Investment and the Ministry of Commerce and Industry. Our extensive knowledge also extends to regulated entities in prominent business centers such as Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Oman, and Qatar. We provide tailor-made solutions to meet the unique challenges faced by our clients. Whether navigating the complexities of the business landscape in Saudi Arabia or venturing into other Gulf Cooperation Council countries, we offer professional and compliant company establishment services that lay a solid foundation for international success.
items.title2: Outsourcing for Residency and Payroll Management
items.desc2: Our comprehensive solutions for employment and human resources in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia include contract management, simplified recruitment, outsourcing for payroll, transfers, and PEO/EOR services. Through close collaboration with the Ministry of Labor, we ensure compliance with employment regulations. We have expertise in social insurance contributions, guidance from experts, and smooth management. Our strong relationships with banks facilitate seamless processing of Wage Protection System (WPS) batches for labor regulation compliance. Entrusting us with recruitment allows companies' human resource needs to focus on core operations, confident in our ability to handle it.
